sect2.title: ErrorEvent
sect2.para: Represents an event cause by user's entering a wrong data or clearing the last wrong data. ErrorEvent is sent when the client detects users entered a wrong value.
Note: if the client doesn't detect the error, the value is sent back to the server with regular event, such as InputEvent

entry.para: Returns the error message if this event is caused by a wrong data, or null if it is to clear messsage.
